items.title: Halloween Clonetrooper Blaster
items.description: If you re going as a Grand Army of the Republic clone trooper  your costume won t be complete without the Halloween Clone Trooper Blaster. This officially-licensed Halloween costume accessory is very similar to the ones used in the films and will look fantastic with a full clone trooper costume. The Halloween gun is made from plastic with bright orange accents. Due to seasonal volume  please review shipping/delivery date options closely.
items.category: Apparel & Accessories > Costumes & Accessories > Costume Accessories
